description: Let T(n,d) = number of distinct d-dimensional polyominoes (or polycubes) with n cells (A049429, A049430); sequence gives Sum_{d} T(n,d).
references: Dan Hoey, Bill Gosper and Rich Schroeppel, Discussions in Math-Fun Mailing list, circa Jul 13 1999.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: R. C. Schroeppel, A few mathematical experiments
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
